Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The microstructure of blend films of the copolymers with fullerene derivatives is known to have a large effect on the charge transport properties and the corresponding efficiencies of PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| copolymers |
| fullerene derivatives |
| PSCs (assuming PSCs stand for "perovskite solar cells") |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The microstructure of blend films of the copolymers with fullerene derivatives is known to have a large effect on the charge transport properties and the corresponding efficiencies of PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| microstructure |
| charge transport properties |
| corresponding efficiencies |

Explanation:

1. "microstructure" is an entity referring to the arrangement of different components in a material.
2. "charge transport properties" is an entity referring to the ability of a material to conduct electric charge.
3. "corresponding efficiencies" is an entity referring to the effectiveness of the material in achieving a desired outcome, in this case, the efficiency of perovskite solar cells (PSCs).

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| charge transport properties |

Explanation:

1. "microstructure" is not a material property in this context, as it refers to the arrangement of different components in a material, rather than a property of the material itself.
2. "charge transport properties" is a material property, as it refers to the ability of a material to conduct electric charge.
3. "corresponding efficiencies" is not a material property, as it refers to the effectiveness of the material in achieving a desired outcome, rather than a property of the material itself.
